description: Offers high quality desktops that have editing software and access to Adobe Premiere. Greenscreen with studio lighting is also available for student access aswell as Digital Camera Equipment.
Offers large tables for maximum space to work and build. Also has Autodesk Inventor, 3D printers, Carvey CNC, and AutoDesk Rivet for Prototyping / 3-D Modeling with desktops.
Offers large tables for group work for the ability to build specific types of electronics.
Offers large tables to encourage group work with access to printers, 3D printers, and a laser cutter. Also includes high quality desktops to plan out designs and projects.
Offers high quality desktops with access to Adoble Cloud and specifcally Adobe Illustrato and Adobe Photoshop. Also has Digital Cameras, a 3D printer, a normal printer, and numerous craft tools.

Offers high quality desktops with the ability to handle apps such as VScode and Adobe Cloud that require a lot of power to run. Numerous whiteboards for planning and educational purposes, as well as a printer accessible to students.
